name: 2 Hour Project Week 2 - Save the Bunnies
name_original: 2 Hour Project Week 2 - Save the Bunnies
description:
Oops I did it again. I made the mistake. Of making a game. In two hours. Kind of.

--THIS WEEK--

I was given:

Cake and the Ghost of Christmas Past - @emmaahume

Feeding Bunnies - @antlerdads

Alcohol, Wizards and Taxis - @Sasha_Harvey

Slinging -  @YuuuPatsu

Alien Zookeeper - @MordanonVihl

Santa - @_hollyrebecca

Story:

You're an alien zookeeper for a non-alien bunny zoo on an alien planet. Everything is fine until, oh no, the legions of Christmas (and some wizards?) came to steal the bunnies! What stops Christmas (and wizards)? Cake and wine! It's up to you to defend the bunnies, and send the armies of Christmas (and some wizards) packing in their regular  taxi.

Controls: 

Click and drag - Aim and fire

E - Changes ammunition

Game:

Throw cake at bunnies to save them. Throw wine at bad guys to destroy them. Bad guys will also get crushed (sometimes). Bunnies can get crushed too but that's bad. You have ten throws!

Thanks for checking out my wak shit.
